mapper.insert: insert into todolist values ((select max(todolist_no)+1 from todolist), #{emp_no}, #{todo1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, default, #{todo2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, default, #{todo3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, default, #{todo4, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, default, #{todo5, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, default, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from todolist where emp_no=#{emp_no} and to_char(todo_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.update: update todolist set check1=#{check1}, check2=#{check2}, check3=#{check3}, check4=#{check4}, check5=#{check5} where emp_no=#{emp_no} and to_char(todo_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
